statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT item_name FROM Inventory WHERE item_type = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM Inventory WHERE item_type='Electronics' AND quantity > 0
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_type='Clothing' ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_type='Furniture' OR item_type='Appliances'
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM AR_VR_Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM AR_VR_Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM AR_VR_Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT asset_name, location, asset_type FROM AR_VR_Assets WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM AR_VR_Assets ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM AR_VR_Inventory WHERE location='Warehouse' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_VR_Assets WHERE asset_type='Software' AND available=True;
SELECT id, location FROM AR_VR_Inventory WHERE quantity>10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM AR_VR_Assets WHERE location='Office';
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, location FROM AR_VR_Inventory WHERE quantity<=5;
SELECT * FROM AR_VR_Inventory;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM AR_VR_Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AR_VR_Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, acquisition_date FROM AR_VR_Assets WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY acquisition_date;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM AR_VR_Assets GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM AR_VR_Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM AR_VR_Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AR_VR_Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, acquisition_date FROM AR_VR_Assets WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity, location FROM AR_VR_Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND location LIKE '%Lab%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE type='Computer';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, quantity FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, type FROM assets WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE location IN ('Warehouse A', 'Warehouse B') AND quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM immersive_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM immersive_assets WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, quantity FROM immersive_assets ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM immersive_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Furniture';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, quantity FROM immersive_assets WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM immersive_assets;
SELECT * FROM immersive_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT username, email FROM immersive_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT asset_id, quantity FROM immersive_assets WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, quantity FROM immersive_assets INNER JOIN asset_usage ON immersive_assets.asset_id = asset_usage.asset_id WHERE asset_usage.user_id = 101;
